metro.GameScreen.TrainLineView

Class TrainLineSelectTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.TrainLineView.TrainLineSelectTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrainInteractionTool

    public class TrainLineSelectTool
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrainInteractionTool
    The TrainLineSelectTool allows the user to create train lines by clicking on all the nodes this line should contain. It can also generate a new train line from all selected nodes.
    Author:
    hauke
